attributes.action: Look into CSA payers to see if they can afford to pay the amount required.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I pay £400 a month for CSA, leaves me £800 a month to pay rent on a 1 bedroom flat (£500) plus food, council tax, bills, travel to work, running cost of vehicle to get to work.. I live in my overdraft, which there is interest payments. I dont regret paying for my children, but hate the fact I cant afford to rent or buy a home so I can have my children come to stay with me overnight or for weekends.. it has never happened in 7 years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
